title: Business Analyst
description:
Job Title: Business Analyst

Location: Andheri, Mumbai (Onsite, Full-Time)




Job Description:

We are looking for a Business Analyst with 3-5 years of experience to join our team in Andheri, Mumbai. This role involves using data to drive business insights and support strategic decisions. The ideal candidate will be proficient in Power BI, MySQL, Advanced Excel, and Business Intelligence tools. As a Business Analyst, you will collaborate with teams to identify opportunities for optimization and present actionable insights.




Key Responsibilities:

Create interactive dashboards and reports using Power BI.
Manage and query databases with MySQL.
Perform complex data analysis using Advanced Excel to generate insights.
Collaborate with stakeholders to define KPIs and business requirements.
Provide actionable recommendations to improve business processes and drive performance.




Skills & Qualifications:

3-5 years of experience as a Business Analyst.
Strong knowledge of Power BI, MySQL, and Advanced Excel.
Solid understanding of Business Intelligence (BI).
Ability to translate complex data into actionable insights.
Excellent communication and problem-solving skills.




Benefits:

Competitive salary and growth opportunities.
Dynamic and collaborative work environment.
